verbose_text: Increased levels of eIF4E are found in several cancers [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], including colon adenoma and carcinoma [XREF_BIBR], breast carcinoma [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], non-Hodgkin 's lymphoma [XREF_BIBR] and primary bladder cancer [XREF_BIBR], and in chronic myeloid leukaemia, the expression of the RNA binding protein hnRNP is abnormally high.
